name: (Old) The Parallel Chronicles E1 Alpha
description:
This is the old alpha for THE PARALLEL, directly inspired by the great Silent Hill series. It no longer represents what the game is now though, but I'm making this public as of 2019 just in case anyone wants to give it a go before the next update. The link below is an even shorter teaser demo showing a bit of what its like now. All still a work in progress.

THE PARALLEL Update Teaser
